job.title: Mid Software Engineer (Java backend/React)
job.description: <ol><li>looking to bring on 2 full stack engineers to help build their inventory service</li><li>More into back-end focused using Java 11-14 (bonus if they are willing to learn Golang)</li><li>Front end experience with preferably React.js is ideal; secondary would be Angular/Vue.js</li><li>Wanted folks w/public cloud experience in a production setting (Azure preferred, AWS).</li></ol><p></p>
